trans-unit.source: An unexpected error has occurred
The maximum number of allowed actions has been reached
The maximum number of allowed actions has been reached
The maximum number of allowed actions has been reached
The specified action was not found
The specified action is invalid
The specified action is already in progress
You do not have enough resources
The specified resource is not tradable
The specified object does not exist
The specified structure does not exist
The specified player does not exist
The map is full!
Unable to build on the specified tile
The requirements for this action have not been met
The requirements for this action have not been met
The market price has changed since you opened the market dialog. Close the dialog and try again.
An invalid quantity was specified
You can't attack yourself!
Not allowed while city is in battle
Why would you want to defend yourself?
